items.title: Can't access Samsung Cloud
items.text: Samsung Cloud has been locked due to a personal data request.

items.title: Processing your request
items.text: To handle your personal data request, we've locked your Samsung Cloud and turned off Sync and Auto back up.

items.title: Processing of personal data restricted
items.text: You've requested restriction of processing of your personal data for this service. To remove the restriction, go to the website where you made the request.

items.title: Can't access Samsung Cloud
items.text: Your Samsung Cloud app has been tampered with or changed. For your security, we blocked access to Samsung Cloud.
